article_title: Despite Zika threat, plan to test ‘Franken-fly’ in Keys remains in federal review limbo
article_text:
Brazil will use the genetically modified mosquitoes as a tool in Zika fight

U.S. review of proposal for Key West test still incomplete after six years

Petition with 160,000 signatures opposes release of the lab-bred mosquito

article_metadata.title: Despite Zika threat, plan to test ‘Franken-fly’ in Keys remains in federal review limbo | Miami Herald

og.description: At the epicenter of the Zika outbreak in Latin America, Brazil and world health officials have embraced a lab-engineered “Franken-fly” as a potential weapon to control a frightening virus suspected of causing horrific birth defects in newborns.
og.title: Despite Zika threat, plan to test ‘Franken-fly’ in Keys remains in federal review limbo
